description: Data captured by an agent representing an event occurring in a monitored app

duration.description: How long the transaction took to complete, in ms with 3 decimal points

id.description: UUID for the transaction, referred by its traces

name.description: Generic designation of a transaction in the scope of a single app (eg: 'GET /users/:id')

result.description: The result of the transaction. HTTP status code for HTTP-related transactions.

timestamp.description: Recorded time of the transaction, UTC based and formatted as YYYY-MM-DDTHH:mm:ss.sssZ

type.description: Keyword of specific relevance in the app's domain (eg: 'request', 'cache', etc)
